ygData.subject: Re: Alliance VS Predacon
ygData.msgSnippet: Deemos is hit bluntly on the side. Deemos: Need new bodyguards. Deemos fires at Goldeneye. Kracken is also struck by Goldeneye, but it was after he had

Deemos is hit bluntly on the side.

Deemos: Need new bodyguards.

Deemos fires at Goldeneye. Kracken is also struck by Goldeneye, but it was
after he had finished transformation, and Mobster was not fazed very much by
Goldeneye's lasers. Mobster fired his battling gun in a rapid blaze at
Goldeneye...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 19, 2000 10:24 AM
Subject: Re: Alliance VS Predacon


> GoldenEye::
> Fires on Deemos and then swoops up into the sky. Goes into a dive and
> fires on Kracken with her lazars.
>
> ::KitKat::
> Gets hit in the side and screams. She looked up at
> Destructor, "Either get us out of here, or put me down so I can fight
> back. I'm a sitting duck here."
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Deemos: Psst, hey, shoot at KitKat, she's their leader, I think.
> >
> > Shokaract: Ugh...
> >
> > Deemos fires at KitKat.
> >
> > Shokaract fires at Disease.
> >
> > Shokaract: Yo, Mafia, make Moster quick.
> >
> > Horn Drill, Kracken, Grenade, and Gigas get ready. Beholder 2
> stares.
> >
> > Kracken: Gestalt form.
> >
> > Beholder 2: Oh, right.
> >
> > They start to unite.
> >
> > Serge fires at KitKat, with one missile.
> >
> > Doom Ice and Rizopas each fire twice at Disease.
> >
> > Diskus fires 2 missiles at KitKat...
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Saturday, November 18, 2000 4:17 PM
> > Subject: Alliance VS Predacon
> >
> >
> > > I authorized the bat probes for Airly on the condition that there
> are
> > > only 8 and that they can't be replaced during battles. It seemed
> > > kinda fair since JP got 5 Inferno clones in the past.
> > >
> > > I agree that the lack of specification is getting really
> > > annoying. "Firing at the enemy" or "Firing at some Alliance
> members"
> > > isn't good form. Also, "Firing at all the Alliance members" can
> imply
> > > that your character is spinning in circles and firing through
> walls,
> > > so please be SPECIFIC!
> > >
> > > Also, KSL has authorized my use of Unitron.
> > >
> > > ::The Oblitercons/Deamon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Six
> > > Shot/Ares/Manterror/Injector/BumbleBee/Double
> > > Punch/Unitron/Zardus/FZ/Perndabot::
> > >
> > > Dark One rolls in the air, dodging a few shots, several of them
> > > hitting him. Dodging some gatling fire, he turns in time to see
> > > Destructor grabb KitKat.
> > >
> > > "Kill the wolf femm," he says over his comm-link to his troops,
> > > launching two signature seeking missiles at KitKat.
> > >
> > > (I don't think the part of the battle involving KitKat should be
> > > continued untill Logo posts if KitKat was grabbed or not. So next
> > > post on this should be hers.)
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > The arrow hits near Pyro, the Oblitercon ignoring the pain as he
> aims
> > > his gun at KitKat on Dark One's orders and opens fire, sending a
> few
> > > fireballs flying at her.
> > >
> > > A rocket hits near him, charring the side of him a bit.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > In HUMVEE mode, Scavenger drives toward Destructor and KitKat,
> firing
> > > dozens of rapid laser shots at KitKat.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Transforming into his artillery cannon mode, Breakdown aims his
> > > weapons at KitKat, firing a few laser shots as well as a missile
> at
> > > the femm.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Hiss, in Robot mode, runs toward KitKat, firing at her from his
> gun.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Dark Claw growls as an arrow hits near him, not being affected by
> the
> > > virus due to his advanced form. He aims his sword at Pestilance,
> the
> > > blade detatching and flying as a missile at the bot, a new blade
> > > replacing it.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Flesh Ripper stumbles back from an explosion in front of him,
> > > laughing as he puts his palms together, launching the ball of
> energy
> > > it forms at Disease.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Manterror yells as pain from the virus goes through him, taking
> him
> > > out of the battle for a few seconds.
> > >
> > > He manages to roll out of the way of a rocket, the explosion
> sending
> > > him flying.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Cloaking after getting up from weapon fire, Double Punch looks up
> as
> > > DarkFate flies in, firing two missiles at the bot.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Injector jupms away as he sees an arrow hit nearby, the virus not
> > > reaching him. He runs after the horsement, firing stinger
> missiles
> > > after them.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > SixShot barrel rolls in the air, dodging weapon fire and
> launching
> > > two missiles at War.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Yelling in pain as the virus surges through him, Ares is thrown
> to
> > > the ground by an explosion.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > BumbleBee flies toward DragonFly, firing a missile at the bot.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Zardus frowns as the Iron Fist reports the stage the battle is
> in,
> > > tapping his comm.
> > >
> > > "Deemos, have your group engage the enemy. Kill as many as you
> can.
> > > Unitron, go intercept any fleeing bots."
> > >
> > > He frowns as he sees Perndabot on the scanners again. "Perndabot,
> go
> > > to the coordinates I'm sending you, back up the Alliance members."
> > >
> > > Sending a mental command to FZ to go and also back up the
> Alliance,
> > > Zardus watches Unitron fly off and head toward the battle.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Recieving Zardus' transmission, Panzertron looks over at
> BrightBlade.
> > >
> > > "Hey, there's a battle I'm needed on, lets go, you can join in
> too!"
> > >
> > > He takes off at a run toward the battle, then activating his
> jetpack
> > > and flying toward it.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > FZ looks up as he recieves Zardus' orders.
> > >
> > > "I must go, Zardus calls," he says to Squizzy, running out of the
> > > room and out of the IF, launching off toward the battle.
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
>
>
>
>
>
